name: Logic School
description: Classical Christian education pedagogy in our Logic School (6th Grade to 8th Grade) by conducting classes in the Socratic method with studies in the liberal arts, logic, speech and debate, discipleship, biblical survey class, and missions.
fullDescription: Classical Christian education pedagogy in our Logic School (6th Grade to 8th Grade) by conducting classes in the Socratic method with studies in the liberal arts, logic, speech and debate, discipleship, biblical survey class, and missions.
whatTheyOffer: Classical Christian education pedagogy in our Logic School (6th Grade to 8th Grade) by conducting classes in the Socratic method with studies in the liberal arts, logic, speech and debate, discipleship, biblical survey class, and missions.
howToGetIt: Begin by scheduling a campus tour here For a detailed overview of the admissions process visit here.
cost: This is a fee based service.
